column2: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)

unblocks some features in Code OSS, for ex. solves the 'extension activation failed' for 'Jupyter' extension. No need for this package if a proprietary Microsoft-branded release of VS Code is installed instead of the Code OSS.
is a graphical and colorful system monitor with vim keybindings.
is an Excel-like terminal spreadsheet manager.
enables the mounting of cell phones.
is a pretty good Git GUI client.
is a pretty good Subversion GUI client.
queues up tasks from the shell for batch execution.
adjusts urxvt font size on the fly.
provides syntax highlighting in the shell.
